name: Papertrell
tag_list: apps, book-apps, android, iphone, windows-phone, publishing, digital-publishing, ebooks, publishers, authors
overview:
Papertrell is a new way of creating and experiencing books and content on mobile platforms.

It’s a daunting task to redefine a 500 year old idea, but that’s exactly what we have set out to do. Our new paradigm encompasses writing, publishing, social media and emerging technologies like smartphones and tablets to create completely new book reading experiences.

Papertrell is targetted at books that offer non-linear reading patterns – such as – reference, self-help, cook books, essays or any other kinds of non-fiction that we don’t often read from cover to cover in order. Non-linear reading has always worked best on paper – until now!
